artifact_update.description: Update an artifact with the specified attributes. All parameters are optional, except that an artifact_id must be provided and if one of cef_field or cef_value is provided then they must both be provided. Supports all fields available in /rest/artifact. Add any unlisted inputs as dictionary keys in input_json. Unsupported keys will automatically be dropped.

fields.description: ID of the artifact to update, which is required unless artifact_id is a key within input_json
fields.label: artifact_id
fields.name: artifact_id

fields.description: Change the name of the artifact.
fields.label: name
fields.name: name

fields.description: Change the label of the artifact.
fields.label: label
fields.name: label

fields.description: Change the severity of the artifact. Typically this is either "High", "Medium", or "Low".
fields.label: severity
fields.name: severity

fields.description: The name of the CEF field to populate in the artifact, such as "destinationAddress" or "sourceDnsDomain". Required only if cef_value is provided.
fields.label: cef_field
fields.name: cef_field

fields.description: The value of the CEF field to populate in the artifact, such as the IP address, domain name, or file hash. Required only if cef_field is provided.
fields.label: cef_value
fields.name: cef_value

fields.description: The CEF data type of the data in cef_value. For example, this could be "ip", "hash", or "domain". Optional, but only operational if cef_field is provided.
fields.label: cef_data_type
fields.name: cef_data_type

fields.description: A comma-separated list of tags to apply to the artifact, which is optional.
fields.label: tags
fields.name: tags

fields.description: Optional input. Either True or False with default as False. If set to True, existing tags on the indicator record will be replaced by the provided input. If set to False, the new tags will be appended to the existing indicator tags.
fields.label: overwrite_tags
fields.name: overwrite_tags

fields.description: Optional parameter to modify any extra attributes of the artifact. Input_json will be merged with other inputs. In the event of a conflict, input_json will take precedence.
fields.label: input_json
fields.name: input_json

artifact_update.label: artifact_update
artifact_update.name: artifact_update
